Configuring DSCP Settings

You can use the DSCP Settings page to configure DSCP-to-QoS queue mapping.

To configure DSCP-to-QoS queue mapping:

 1. Choose QoS > DSCP Settings.

 2. Choose whether to only list RFC values or to list all DSCP values in the DSCP Settings Table by clicking the relevant button.

 3. For each DSCP value in the DSCP Settings Table, choose a priority level from the Queue drop-down menu.

This maps the DSCP value to the selected QoS queue.

 4. Click Save.

 

To restore the default DSCP settings, click Restore Default and Save.
